item.title: Report X-2025020804
item.description:
Report X-2025020804

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-23T00:59:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-16
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package was found wet. Upon inspection found 1 4-pack box of Pond Champs algaeX 1-gallon was wet. 1 bottle had loose lid & seal beneath lid was wet & corroded resulted to leakage. Outer package didn't display any hazmat markings but the 4-pack box inside had limited quantity diamond sticker.

item.title: Report X-2025020809
item.description:
Report X-2025020809

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-23T00:59:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-15
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package was found wet. Upon inspection found 1 4-pack box of Pond Champs AlgaeX algaecide/herbicide 1-gallon was wet. 1 bottle had dent on side & small crack hole near lid resulted to leakage. Outer package didn't have hazmat markings but the 4-pack box inside display a limited quantity diamond sticker.

item.title: Report E-2025020102
item.description:
Report E-2025020102

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-23T00:59:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-07
  • City: POMPANO BEACH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On February 7, 2025, one (1) 55-gallon drum of pentanes was damaged and released approximately three (3) ounces of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from American Safety, LLC (AS) to remediate the site. The crew overpacked the damaged drum into one (1) 95-gallon drum. The crew utilized absorbents and containerized all spent material in one (1) 5-gallon pail.

item.description:
Report X-2025020780

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-02
  • City: ORLANDO
  • State: FL

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The shipment was discovered leaking during sort operations. Outer packaging is a fiberboard box (overpack). Inner contents: 1 metal/steel drum in a plastic bag, dented on the bottom and loose top/cap. Unable to obtain UN Specifications for the drum. All contents were placed in a salvage drum and held pending disposition from the shipper.
